1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Ubaidullah bin 'Abdullah bin 'Umar that his father said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'If the water is the amount of two or three Qullah, nothing can make it impure (Najis).'" (Sahih) Another chain with similar wording

chapter.ara-name: باب مِقْدَارِ الْمَاءِ الَّذِي لاَ يَنْجَسُ
chapter.eng-name: The quantity of water that does not become unclean
